title: NFL owners are expected to approve $200 million loan to help finance new Bills stadium - ProFootballTalk
content: NFL owners are expected to approve $200 million loan to help finance new Bills stadium  ProFootballTalk
description: The Bills have moved a step closer to securing private financing for construction on a new $1.4 billion stadium in Orchard Park.The NFLâ€™s joint stadium and finance committee voted Friday to recommend owners approve a loan up to $200 million to Bills owners Kim and Terry Pegula, the Buffalo News reports.Owners will vote on the [more]
